Triple-fatal motorbike crash near Taihape: Funeral for third victim Luke Shaw as other riders’ services held https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/triple-fatal-motorbike-crash-near-taihape-funeral-for-third-victim-luke-shaw-as-other-riders-services-held/TEGZEJFV55HENHAPZSAHPSZDHI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/triple-fatal-motorbike-crash-near-taihape-funeral-for-third-victim-luke-shaw-as-other-riders-services-held/TEGZEJFV55HENHAPZSAHPSZDHI/ Raphael FranksShaw died alongside Lesley Brooks, 46 and Jacob Coady, 24, in crash on SH1 on Saturday.
